How do I change the splash screen?: Which splash screen? The gnome splash screen?

In the gconf-editor, go to: apps/gnome-session/options, right-click the splash_image key and choose the desired image, ex.: splash/gnome-splash-context.png. Keep in mind that the "splash/" part of the above must preceed the new splash filename.
You can put new splash screens in /usr/share/pixmaps/splash
